summary: A script to run SkyProc jar files
descriptionHtml:
Basically some users, and myself, of SkyProc mods have had issues running the .jar file that needs to be ran after installation. After looking into it, some people recommended right-clicking and running with cmd (command prompt). It did not work so I found that you needed to run it with Admin cmd. After trying to help a buddy of mine I decided to make this little executable script that starts cmd as admin, changes the directory to where the jar file is located, and launches the jar file. Since I have it I might as well share it with the community.

For use with these mods (there may be more, these are just the ones I know of):
Dual Sheath Redux http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?
ReProccer http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28467/?
SUM (If you use multiple mods that need this done use this one and it does all of them at the same time) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29865/?


Usage:
1. Unrar the file.
2. Right click the .cmd file and select edit
3. Check if the third to last line contains the install directory to your SkyProc Patcher jar file, if it doesn't go ahead and change the directory to the correct install path
4. Exit and save
5. Run the .cmd file and use the SkyProc Patcher as per their instructions
author: KageSama19
